website_summaries.verdict: Stainless steel case looks great and provides nice build quality. Comfortable enough for daily wear.
pros: Customers love the lightweight feel of this dressy watch from a trustworthy company
Crystal accents on bezel and lugs look great
cons: Some owners say band's size is difficult to adjust and no directions are included in the package

customer_reviews.title: Perfect watch for all occasions
customer_reviews.text: I have worn this watch daily for about 2.5 months, and I have been very happy so far. It arrived charged, and with normal wear I have not had to do anything to recharge. I like that the watch is fairly dainty and doesn't call a ton of attention to itself, but at the same time it is very beautiful. The small stones help dress it up so it is quite versatile and can be dressed up or down. As a mom, it has been perfect so I don't have to constantly carry my phone around the house to keep track of the time, and it goes with nearly my entire wardrobe. I would definitely purchase again!
customer_reviews.author: MsSunshine

customer_reviews.title: Great watch
customer_reviews.text: THis watch in person is even more beautiful than picture. I put it under a lamp to charge and it hasn’t missed a beat since So comfortable to wear I forget I have it on and have slept with it on several times . Had my jeweler make it smaller as it is a generous size. love the clasp. I would highly recommend; looks great for everyday wear and for more formal wear. You can’t go wrong.
customer_reviews.author: Janetw Comer

customer_reviews.title: I bought this as a gift years ago
customer_reviews.text: I bought this for my mother two years ago as a Christmas gift. She still wears it to this day and has thoroughly enjoyed it.
customer_reviews.author: Shawn

customer_reviews.title: Great for skin allergies, beautiful, glistens under the sun, easy to adjust watch band.
customer_reviews.text: Gorgeous watch, just like it's shown in the pictures. I was allergic to my other watch as the stainless steel coating wore off from sweat after a few months. I've been wearing this for a few months now, and my symptoms have not returned. Its beautiful alabaster face and crystals glisten under the sun...very pretty. Great for everyday use, but would also look good with an evening gown for more formal occasions. Very versatile. Also, the watch band was very easy to adjust. I'm not savvy in tinkering with mechanical / electronic devices, but I was able to adjust the watch band myself with a couple of youtube videos and a random, simple watch repair kit from Amazon.
customer_reviews.author: J. Wang

customer_reviews.title: Fantastic solar watch
customer_reviews.text: Love, love, love my watch! No battery! The best! And you do not have to put it in sunny spot every two weeks!my watch has been running now for six months without it being in sunlight! So beautiful and elegant!
customer_reviews.author: D. Burke

customer_reviews.title: Beautiful watch!
customer_reviews.text: I got this on sale for prime day for $80 to replace my old $15 watch from target that didn't last very long. This watch is so beautiful with the crystals around the face, mother of pearl face, and V shaped links. I had to go to a jeweler to get it adjusted to my wrist since it was too big for me, but that is easy to do. I love watches that look like bracelets, and this is perfect in the silver color. Also love that it is solar powered so I don't have to keep getting the battery replaced when it dies. It was well worth the price, especially since I got it for such a big discount!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Seiko is the only way to go!!!
customer_reviews.text: I have always been a Seiko girl and last year for my Birthday my son gave me a Bulova watch. Never again would I get that Brand! The clasp was a joke and my crystal was scratched up so badly that it was unreadable! The last spread was the battery did not make it one year! I purchased this Seiko for the brand and style:) it is solar powered so there will be no battery issues:) I love the weight of the watch! Happy to be back with my Seiko!!!!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Very Satisfied
customer_reviews.text: The watch was selected by my wife as a gift for her sister. There was a one day delay in delivery which was no problem. The seller provided excellent follow-up and the watch was delivered the following day. It is an excellent watch and of very good quality. We would be very pleased to recommend this product and the seller.
customer_reviews.author: NevBill

customer_reviews.title: Read description carefully about this pretty timepiece.
customer_reviews.text: This watch is very pretty. I love that it is solar powered, hopefully that feature will remain as reliable as my last Seiko. I have not found any way to shorten the band however. That is disappointing. In future I will have to be more careful selecting another. My last Seiko was a stretch band type that permitted removal of excess links. This one is not a stretch band.
customer_reviews.author: Cher

customer_reviews.title: Great looking watch.
customer_reviews.text: I actually purchased this watch from another vendor months ago but it was defective. I saw it again on Amazon and purchased it. This time I received a good watch. It's beautiful. I love that the clasp can't come undone and slip off your wrist. I need to have a couple of links removed, I rear it like a bracelet right now, but I love Seiko watches and this one is one of my favorite watches. Very stylish.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Beautiful!
customer_reviews.text: Beautiful does not even begin to describe this amazingly stunning women's watch. It sparkles in all forms of light, and is perfect for casual or formal wear. It fits perfectly! I am still in awe of how gorgeous this watch is. Seiko is an excellent brand, so I could not expect anything else than perfection.
customer_reviews.author: KayNas

customer_reviews.title: Beautiful watch! Suitable for all styles.
customer_reviews.text: This watch is fabulous. Very pretty, can be worn casual or dressy. So far as quality,it's superb. I have the same watch in gold and it's already exceeded the warranty period with absolutely no problems at all. Great value for the price. In general, for watches in this price point, Seiko cannot be beat.
customer_reviews.author: Weekly Reader

customer_reviews.title: Not what I expected
customer_reviews.text: This watch got rave reviews. however I'm not that impressed with it. It's cheap looking for a Seiko, lightweight and doesn't appear durable. Overall quality of the watch is fair. I will probably return it. It does fit well and is comfortable (may have to remove a few links) .
customer_reviews.author: PeggyC

customer_reviews.title: Quality, Beauty, & functionality!!!
customer_reviews.text: I originally ordered both the silver and gold version. The pictures online do not do these watches justice! The quality is top notch, styling sophisticated, and the functionality with the solar is flawless! I think I might buy the silver with the gold next!!!
customer_reviews.author: K.Lani Lucas

customer_reviews.title: One of my favorite watches
customer_reviews.text: I was afraid it would be a bit to small to read but it's not. I also didn't notice it was a solar powered watch when I ordered it but I really like that. It's dainty and feminine and I really enjoy wearing it.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Absolutely gorgeous!!
customer_reviews.text: Absolutely beautiful piece of jewelry!! I wear it every day and get compliments constantly!! Great quality and style!!
customer_reviews.author: Linda L

customer_reviews.title: Lovely
customer_reviews.text: This is a very nice watch. We bought it for my mother-in-law who absolutely loves it. She says she can read the face very easily.
customer_reviews.author: Wanda King

customer_reviews.title: I love this watch!!!
customer_reviews.text: I received this watch a few days ago. I was tired of having to get batteries replaced in my other watches and decided on a solar watch. This is my first one. My wrist is very small, so I had to get 6 links removed to fit. It still dangles a bit and I now love the length. On the day it arrived I put in under sunlight for a few minutes and it was ready to go! It is simple and beautiful....for casual and dressy!
customer_reviews.author: Sheila Kathryn White

customer_reviews.title: Perfect Choice for my needs
customer_reviews.text: This was just the watch I was looking for and I know Seiko quality so I felt my choice was perfect. I hope it lives up to the reputation that I remember. I like that it is solar. As soon as I put it in the sun it began to keep time. While I have a small wrist and had to remove links, for someone with a larger wrist it is perfect. The face is easy to read and the size of the face is perfect for me; not too large and not too small.
customer_reviews.author: LG

customer_reviews.title: Smart looking watch..I love it
customer_reviews.text: I like this watch, it is medium size, dressy but not too dressy, goes with casual or dress. Good value for money and is solar, no battery changes, yay.
customer_reviews.author: Judy Waters

customer_reviews.title: Pretty & functional
customer_reviews.text: Christmas present, so I've had it for about 5 months. Love the style, works great, really love the clasp. The clasp on my last watch started failing and it would fall off, this clasp is the type that if it comes undone the band doesn't come all the way apart and so it won't fall off my arm.
customer_reviews.author: Winglet

customer_reviews.title: Beautiful watch
customer_reviews.text: This seiko watch is stunning and looks a lot more expensive than it is! People notice it right away and are very impressed by it :-) Perfect for a woman with small wrist. It is very classy! I highly recommend it, you won't regret it and you will make someone very Happy!!
customer_reviews.author: Philippe P

customer_reviews.title: Beautiful and useful
customer_reviews.text: Love my watch. Only thing against is, I have small wrists and took out all links to make fit. Love the bling.
customer_reviews.author: M. Baril

customer_reviews.title: Looks kind of Cheap, Flattering Fit
customer_reviews.text: I love the shape of this watch, flattering on my wrist which is rare. However I hated the 'diamonds' and somehow the silver seemed dull. I replaced it with a black one that I absolutely love. The solar power function is perfect. I hate changing batteries!
customer_reviews.author: RayChu

customer_reviews.title: so this one is perfect for me
customer_reviews.text: I prefer smaller, feminine watches, so this one is perfect for me. Watchband is quite long, most will need to have links removed to make it smaller. Easy to read even in dark areas. I was able to read it during a movie.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Beautiful, well made watch.
customer_reviews.text: Beautiful watch at a beautiful price. My Mom gets compliments on it often.
customer_reviews.author: Cyndi B

customer_reviews.title: She loved it
customer_reviews.text: Got this watch for my girl. She wanted me to pick her out something slim yet classy that could also be used as an every day watch. After two days of searching this watch kept catching my eye. So I bought it. It was even better in person. Classy and elegant without breaking the bank. My girl loves this watch. It made a great surprise gift.
customer_reviews.author: Casey Pronschinske

customer_reviews.title: Four Stars
customer_reviews.text: I wish there are adjustable sizes this watch just slides of my wrist.
customer_reviews.author: Alex

customer_reviews.title: No more batteries!
customer_reviews.text: Great watch--clasp very easy to use. Solar powered. Nice design
customer_reviews.author: Laura CA USA

customer_reviews.title: Doesn't ever need a battery
customer_reviews.text: This watch is very pretty and the details are gorgeous!
customer_reviews.author: Jocelyne P

customer_reviews.title: Love this watch!
customer_reviews.text: Love this watch. I have the gold one just like it. Very pretty and comfortable to wear. Many compliments on my gold one. Best of all......no batteries to worry about.
customer_reviews.author: Eleanor K. Fly

customer_reviews.title: Was given as a gift and the recipient loved it.
customer_reviews.text: Even prettier in person. Was given as a gift and the recipient loved it.
customer_reviews.author: Ken A

customer_reviews.title: Unique Watch!
customer_reviews.text: Really unique and elegant design. Purchased as a gift for my girlfriend and she loved it.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: I've had good luck with solar watches
customer_reviews.text: Wife has problems with watches (time fluctuation, batteries having to be changed often). I've had good luck with solar watches, so I wanted her to give one a try. Her birthday is coming up soon and this was to be a early birthday present. She loves the watch, and so far no problems with it keeping proper time. Thanks.
customer_reviews.author: coolbreeze

customer_reviews.title: but my wife loves thewatch and gets get compliments for friends at her health ...
customer_reviews.text: OK ,,, I had doubts about solar watches, but my wife loves the watch and gets get compliments for friends at her health club.
customer_reviews.author: Outdoorsman

customer_reviews.title: Pretty, with a caution if you are only using it periodically.
customer_reviews.text: Pretty and well made. The solar approach is good if you wear the watch often enough. If you only wear it occasionally you will find that you will need to charge it. Kind of a paid for that use. For daily or even weekly use, it is great.
customer_reviews.author: W from Chicago Metro

customer_reviews.title: Beautiful
customer_reviews.text: Don't need to buy batteries. Yeh!! Love wearing it. Can wear it casual or dressy.
customer_reviews.author: Trudy L. Crowley

customer_reviews.title: Anniversary hit
customer_reviews.text: Hey, it worked for me! My wife LOVES it! It is a gorgeous watch with Seiko dependability. What more can you ask?
customer_reviews.author: Mike in Temple

customer_reviews.title: Beautiful watch!
customer_reviews.text: This watch is simply beautiful! I had to remove six links as it was way too big for my wrist, but it was easy to do. The solar feature is what sold me on it - plus the simple beauty of the watch itself! Seiko makes a good product for a very reasonable price.
customer_reviews.author: Beth Wilson

customer_reviews.title: Receiver thought it was absolutely beautiful. I might even buy one for myself
customer_reviews.text: Watch was a gift. Receiver thought it was absolutely beautiful. I might even buy one for myself. Looks very elegant and dainty on your wrist.
customer_reviews.author: Jeanne M. Benson

customer_reviews.title: It is so elegant
customer_reviews.text: The bracelet was perfect size and the numbers are not too small. I will definitely recommend this product.
customer_reviews.author: master of the universe

customer_reviews.title: It is beautiful but I had to return it
customer_reviews.text: It is beautiful but I had to return it. It is very funny that the time was about right when the watch just sat on a desktop, but whenever someone was wearing it, it was almost running slow (got around 5 ~10 minutes slower every hour)
customer_reviews.author: Johnson

customer_reviews.title: I like the fact that this watch is solar
customer_reviews.text: This watch is very stylish with just the right amount of bling. I like the fact that this watch is solar. I get frustrated with paying for watch batteries. The clasp is easy to use and the watch is very comfortable to wear. I own another Seiko watch, a Seiko kinetic, but this solar model is now my favorite.
customer_reviews.author: Susan Hite

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: very pretty watch..not too much bling. sized for petite person/wrist.
customer_reviews.author: Janet C

customer_reviews.title: It’s dependable
customer_reviews.text: Very nice just as I expected good service and quality thanks Rev.Ruben Vanhoose dd
customer_reviews.author: Ruben vanhoose

customer_reviews.title: Beautiful!
customer_reviews.text: Beautiful, bought to give as a gift. She loved it!
customer_reviews.author: Leslie Harris

customer_reviews.title: It's a really pretty watch and keeps the time!
customer_reviews.text: Too big and no easy way to size that I could find. However, it's very pretty and I love that it's solar powered!
customer_reviews.author: Sherrie L.

customer_reviews.title: I love this watch
customer_reviews.text: I love this watch, my husband got it for me for my birthday, I have had it for a month now. I have a large wrist and usually have to add links to watches this fits me perfectly, I could even take a link or two out. It keeps time great. It is better looking then the picture the face has a mother of peal with a few swirls of beautiful lite color that comes out when light hits the face. Also there is no glare when checking the time in the light.

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars

customer_reviews.title: Wear thiswatch daily, just love it
customer_reviews.text: Wear this watch daily, just love it. I'm considering buying another one just so I have a spare.

customer_reviews.text: Looks a little better on the picture than it does for real. It is stainless steel, and looks like it.

customer_reviews.title: Love It!
customer_reviews.text: Love this watch. It's pretty, keep time and it's solar. What more could I ask? This isn't the first Seiko I've had, and I've been pleased with all of them.

customer_reviews.title: Love it. Especially like the strong loop clasp
customer_reviews.text: Very classy and dainty. Love it. Especially like the strong loop clasp.

customer_reviews.title: Love this watch!

Love to wear it even go to bed. Plus the battery don't go out for as long as you wear it under lights. I will never have to replace the battery.

customer_reviews.title: Very pretty watch. I like that it is solar
customer_reviews.text: Very pretty watch. I like that it is solar. The clasp is super easy to use. This watch makes a statement without being over-sized and too bold. The band is unique, which I love.

customer_reviews.title: The watch probably would have been fine, except the minute hand was not attached to ...
customer_reviews.text: The watch probably would have been fine, except the minute hand was not attached to the watch. It was floating around in the casing. I returned the watch. Very disappointed because I have a couple of other Seiko watches that I really like and have found very reliable.
customer_reviews.author: April

customer_reviews.title: Beautiful watch
customer_reviews.text: Bought these for my wife, she loved it. The dial is not quite as "pearlescent" as in the photo, but looks great nevertheless.

customer_reviews.title: Love the SOLAR
customer_reviews.text: The appearance of this watch is so great . I know with Seiko you get a great product.

customer_reviews.title: Quality timepiece.

customer_reviews.title: Elegant beautiful watch!
customer_reviews.text: I'm living in Japan, couldn't find out good nice design, but when I saw this watch, I knew that it is the watch I've been seeking. The price is reasonable though it is Seiko Brand. At once I desided to import it from US. It arrived me sooner than I expected. I love it's very elegant form. I already have gold color watch, but sometime it does not suit with some cloth, and now this silver watch will be a good companion with me,too.

I've small wrists, so I had to get four links removed, but this was easily done by a local jeweler. The unique design was what caught my eye originally, and I'm very happy with it.

customer_reviews.text: So happy I chose this watch. I have a petite wrist and spent a lot of time searching for one that would show well on it and be comfortable. This is it! It also has the elegance I was looking for and the solar power is a bonus so I won't have to worry about the battery failing when I want to wear it. Love it! Very easy to adjust with the little link removal tool I also bought on Amazon.

customer_reviews.title: Beautiful Solar Watch
customer_reviews.text: Beautiful watch! Very feminine! This is my first solar watch so we shall see how long it will last. Something I was not aware prior to purchasing is that solar watches are not battery free. This watch has a different type of battery which also need to be replaced at some point in time. Hopefully, it will last a lot longer than regular watch battery. Also, the watch is long so if you are petite like I am, a lot of links will have to be removed. Overall, very pleased with my purchase.

customer_reviews.title: watch could not be set so you could tell the correct time
customer_reviews.text: When you tried to set the time the hour hand was between numbers. For example, if you tried to set it to 6pm, you would put the minute hand at 12, and the hour hand would be between 5 and 6. You couldn't tell if it was 5pm or 6pm
customer_reviews.author: phil ruth

product_meta.title: Seiko Women's SUP173 "Jewelry-Solar Classic" Silver-Tone Stainless Steel Watch
product_meta.description:
From Humble beginnings, Kintaro Hattori’s Vision for Seiko has become reality. A consuming passion for excellence - imprinted in our Corporate DNA passed from generation to generation. Seiko, for 125 years committed to the art and science of time.

 A culture of innovation connects a 19th century Tokyo clock shop with 20th century advances in timekeeping to an extraordinary 21st century "quiet revolution." Continually driven by dedication and passion, established a multitude of world’s first technologies… transforming the principles of timekeeping. 

 The first quartz wristwatch – changed the history of time. 

 The first Kinetic – marked a new era in quartz watch technology. 

 In 1969, Seiko Astron, the first quartz wristwatch - was introduced. 

 In an instant, Seiko exponentially improved the accuracy of wristwatches –And Seiko technology firmly established today’s standard in Olympic and sports timing. 

 1984, another celebrated first – Kinetic Technology – powered by body movement. 

 Kinetic – a quartz mechanism with unparalleled accuracy –the driving force behind more world’s firsts. 

 Kinetic Chronograph – the next generation of high performance timekeeping. 

 Kinetic Auto Relay – automatically resets to the correct time. 

 Kinetic Perpetual - combining the date perfect technology of perpetual calendar with the genius of Kinetic Auto Relay. 

 And now Kinetic Direct Drive – move, and the watch is powered automatically. Or hand wind it and see the power you are generating in real time. 

 In the realm of fine watches, time is measured by Seiko innovation – A heritage of dedication to the art and science of time.



Seiko Solar. No battery change required and powered by all types of light. Solar cell with high performance electricity generation. Energy-efficient movement with long power reserve. This elegant dress watch has a brushed and polished stainless steel case and bracelet featuring Swarovski crystals on the bezel. The timepiece is constructed with a durable crystal that protects the light pink mother-of-pearl dial. 50 meters water resistant.

From Humble beginnings, Kintaro Hattori’s Vision for Seiko has become reality. A consuming passion for excellence - imprinted in our Corporate DNA passed from generation to generation. Seiko, for 125 years committed to the art and science of time.

 A culture of innovation connects a 19th century Tokyo clock shop with 20th century advances in timekeeping to an extraordinary 21st century "quiet revolution." Continually driven by dedication and passion, established a multitude of world’s first technologies… transforming the principles of timekeeping. 

 The first quartz wristwatch – changed the history of time. 

 The first Kinetic – marked a new era in quartz watch technology. 

 In 1969, Seiko Astron, the first quartz wristwatch - was introduced. 

 In an instant, Seiko exponentially improved the accuracy of wristwatches –And Seiko technology firmly established today’s standard in Olympic and sports timing. 

 1984, another celebrated first – Kinetic Technology – powered by body movement. 

 Kinetic – a quartz mechanism with unparalleled accuracy –the driving force behind more world’s firsts. 

 Kinetic Chronograph – the next generation of high performance timekeeping. 

 Kinetic Auto Relay – automatically resets to the correct time. 

 Kinetic Perpetual - combining the date perfect technology of perpetual calendar with the genius of Kinetic Auto Relay. 

 And now Kinetic Direct Drive – move, and the watch is powered automatically. Or hand wind it and see the power you are generating in real time. 

 In the realm of fine watches, time is measured by Seiko innovation – A heritage of dedication to the art and science of time.



Seiko Solar. No battery change required and powered by all types of light. Solar cell with high performance electricity generation. Energy-efficient movement with long power reserve. This elegant dress watch has a brushed and polished stainless steel case and bracelet featuring Swarovski crystals on the bezel. The timepiece is constructed with a durable crystal that protects the light pink mother-of-pearl dial. 50 meters water resistant.
feature_bullets: Jewelry watch in silver-tone stainless steel with Swarovski crystals at bezel and bracelet
Protective hardlex crystal dial window. 12-month power reserve once fully charged
Features dial with stylish arabic numbers at 12 and 6 o'clock and push-button clasp closure
Water resistant to 99 feet (30 M). withstands rain and splashes of water, but not showering or submersion
Japanese-quartz movement with analog display. Case Size: 22 mm, Case Thickness: 10 mm, Band Width: 9 mm, Band Length: 7.5 inches
